metadata.title: CVE-2024-35945 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:phy: phy_device: Prevent nullptr exceptions on ISR If phydev->irq is setunconditionally, check for valid interrupt handler or fall back to pollingmode to prevent nullptr exceptions in interrupt service routine.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
